string.value: [Collect] Red Ribbons Around the Pig's Neck
#b#@1092012:##k in #b#m120000200##k has a favor to ask of you.

He wants to conduct research on the Ribbon around the #rRed Ribbon Pig#k's neck.
Hunt #Red Ribbon Pigs#k and collect 20 #rRed Ribbons#k.
#rRed Ribbon Pigs#k can be easily found in #b#m100030000##k.

Report back to #b#@1092012:##k in #b#m120000200##k upon completion.
You have collected 20 #rRed Ribbons#k for the research.

Hmm, are you busy? If you have some time, I'd like to ask you for some help. Oh, it's something really easy, so don't worry. I've been conducting research on monsters, and I became curious as to what material the #rRed Ribbons#k on the #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k are made of.\n\nI would like to ask you to collect some #rRed Ribbons#k for me. What do you say?
Good! Then Eliminate some #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k and collect 20 #rRed Ribbons#k. You'll find many #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k in #b#m100030000##k.
Wow, that was very quick! You're good.\nLet me have them then. I want to analyze them.
